channel.title: Commons on Open Science Escape Room
channel.description: Recent content in Commons on Open Science Escape Room

item.title: Decipher
item.description: symbol letter ✪ V ❖ I ◉ Y ❥ O ⑄ C ␦ P ⎖ E ⏚ Z ⍦ K ▲ S ↓ T ☡ B ◘ F ⌄ A When you’ve deciphered the code, it spells the name of a website facilitating researchers who wish to share their research.

item.title: Enter the code
item.description: Robin So you think you’ve collected all the letters, you should have 14 of them by now. These letters together form a word, or a name rather The name refers to a well-known Nature journal that recently increased its APC. The next clue is the new APC in 2021 in US dollars of this journal. You may use Google to find the APCs Here’s how you unlock the key: Open a new tab in your browser Write this text on a piece of paper: norment.
